relation: Justin Masterson starts the inning for the Red Sox.
David Wright walked. Runner on first with none out and Jeremy Reed due up.
Jeremy Reed grounded into a fielder's choice, first to short. Runner on first with one out and Omir Santos due up.
Omir Santos struck out swinging. Runner on first with two outs and Ramon Martinez due up.
Ramon Martinez struck out looking to end the inning.
pageTitle: Friday, May 22, 2009 Interleague Game: New York Mets - Boston Red Sox Box Scores, Game Results & Summary - USATODAY.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {31940=Jason Varitek homered and knocked in two runs for the Red Sox, who had a three-game win streak stopped in the return for Daisuke Matsuzaka (0-2). The Japanese right-hander, who had been sidelined since mid-April with arm fatigue, surrendered five hits and four runs over five frames., 32586=The Red Sox haven't lost a series at home since their first of the season, April 7-9 against Tampa Bay. This was their third loss in the last 18 games at Fenway Park.}
